title: How to Succeed
author: Dimterion
description: An everlasting story of achieving greatness.

1.text: You wake up in the morning with the idea of a story.

2.text: You continue your day as usual, nothing happens.

3.text: Your develop the idea and create something great.

options.text: Give up and go back to your routine
